name: Criminal Street
description:
My solo entry for Ludum Dare 44.

I overscoped (again) and have to submit to jam (again). But I'm actually proud of this one, it's a really fun game!

Game Design - me
Art - me
Music - me
SFX - freesound.org

Controls

Drag and drop the wanted criminals into the WANTED panel to catch them. Don't let 'em get away, and don't falsely imprison people!
